attributes.action: desist from creating a police state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I.D cards,speed cameras,
eavesdropping cctv systems,fingerprinting of innocent victims of an increasingly more powerful  police state and the erosion of civil liberties and free speech..
Blair`s Britain,remember who stole your freedom, remember the time you were free.
